modules.title: Module 1: Web Games vs Websites
modules.summary: Rewire your mindset from event-driven UI to frame-driven simulation.

modules.title: Module 2: Rendering & The Game Loop
modules.summary: Master the heart of every game utilizing requestAnimationFrame and delta time.

modules.title: Module 3: Canvas Fundamentals
modules.summary: Learn immediate mode rendering and the coordinate system of HTML5 Canvas.

modules.title: Module 4: Input Systems
modules.summary: Build reliable, responsive controls by tracking input state instead of just events.

modules.title: Module 5: Assets, Audio & Loading
modules.summary: Handle asynchronous asset loading and audio latency to avoid broken visuals.

modules.title: Module 6: Game Architecture & State
modules.summary: Prevent spaghetti code by implementing state management and proper game states.

modules.title: Module 7: Collision Detection & Physics
modules.summary: Make games feel physical with AABB collision detection and bounding boxes.

modules.title: Module 8: Performance & Optimization
modules.summary: Run smoothly on devices by understanding object pooling and garbage collection.

modules.title: Module 9: Multiplayer Fundamentals
modules.summary: Understand real-time networking models like Client-Server and why to never trust the client.

modules.title: Module 10: WebSockets & Real-Time Sync
modules.summary: Enable real-time communication with WebSockets, handling latency and tick rates.

modules.title: Module 11: Game Security & Anti-Cheat
modules.summary: Prevent common exploits and hacks by validating state on the server.

modules.title: Module 12: Deployment & Monetization
modules.summary: Ship your game, track analytics, and understand expert production practices.
